name: All You Can Eat (itch)
description: All You Can Eat is a Tower Defense game where you must deploy moving chefs to feed the on coming rush of hungry customers. Let a hungry customer reach the end of the path, and they will leave your restaurant a negative rating. Conversely, a satisfied customer will leave a positive rating, and a tip. If your restaurants star rating hits zero, it's game over! To play, please open the game in full screen!
